channel.title: Kristofer Gustafsson
channel.description: Website of hobbyist artist Kristofer Gustafsson.

item.title: Well, this is my first post!
item.description:
Welcome. :) My website is a bit of a mess right now, trying to fix things bit by bit. I have an upcoming post about a collage I made a few weeks ago, it was an interesting experience and I want to write a bit about that.

Regarding the website I want it to feel more personal than those you mostly find on the web. Well.. Right now it’s kinda barebone but I will get there eventually. Been thinking about adding disqus support as well, but it’s not a priority.

Anyway, welcome and enjoy. :)
